data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: According to Luke 20:27, the Sadducees "say there is no resurrection". What ____ been ____ is ____ explanation ____ what ____ phrase ____. Why ____ they ____ there ____ no ____? This is what is being deleted.
data.partBlankContent: According to Luke 20:27, the Sadducees "say there is no resurrection". What h__ been del____ is a_ explanation o_ what th__ phrase me___. Why d__ they s__ there w__ no resurr______? This is what is being deleted.
data.answer: 根据路加福音20:27，撒都该人“说没有复活的事”。删除的部分是对这个短语含义的解释。为什么他们看到没有复活?这就是被删除的内容。
